question: Softball Buffy?
answer:
omg this makes me so flipping happy!! i love this

  • okay so buffy would be a badass infielder,, maybe at 1st (but she really wants to play catcher)
  • she’s been playing every summer for like ever and practices with her dad (they send her mom videos of buffy’s progress)
  • she’s one of the strongest and most hardworking members on the team (in the field and at bat)
  • also buffy hits tooons of home runs bc c’mon ofc she can
  • cyrus, andi, jonah, and marty make posters and cheer her on at the games
  • after the games they all go get baby taters and go to the arcade
  • one time andi reaaallly wanted to decorate buffy’s bat and she covered it in stickers and tied ribbons of buddy’s favorite colors at the bottom (buffy doesn’t hit with it anymore but keeps it in her bag at all times)
  • buffy and jonah (hes a baseball boy) go to the batting cages a lot after school and over spring break
  • at her last game of the season, her coach finally puts her in as catcher and lets just say buffy is the best dang catcher on the team
  • surprise! her mom is in the stands when buffy hits a home run which wins the game for her team

summary: What song do you think sums up Tyrus the most for you?
question: What song do you think sums up Tyrus the most for you?
answer:
Honestly? I think it’s really hard to beat Everything Has Changed by Taylor Swift. 

I hate to say that because choosing a love song by Taylor Swift feels like such a basic answer. But I already think that song is one of the best lighthearted crush songs, and I think there’s a lot of lyrics that work from both TJ and Cyrus’ perspectives and that the general theme of “everything has changed” really fits their relationship well. 

“All I’ve seen since eighteen hours ago is green eyes, and freckles, and your smile in the back of my mind making me feel like I just want to know you better.” 

I would apply this to how Cyrus felt after they first talked at the swings. Cyrus didn’t immediately recognize that he was developing feelings for TJ, but he did want to get to know him better. I would almost describe him as fascinated by the entire interaction. Immediately following it, Cyrus texted Andi about it how he and TJ helped each other feel better, and how he could see that there was more to TJ than meets the eye. And he clearly spent some time thinking about TJ, because the very next episode he shows up at school prepared to invite TJ to his Bar Mitzvah, and is later concerned enough to check up on him at the basketball game - both of which are clear signs of wanting to get to know someone better. And of course, TJ has green eyes and we mostly see him smile around Cyrus - so the details make sense too. 

“All my walls stood tall, painted blue, but I’ll take them down and open up the door for you.”

I would apply this to how TJ felt when they first talked at the swings, and when they talked during the basketball game. TJ had been building up walls and pushing people away for who knows how long. He had built up this reputation as being tough and unapproachable as a way of protecting himself, but the second that Cyrus came into his life - he started showing vulnerability. Every time that TJ started to open up about his “stuff” to Cyrus - he was taking down those walls.

“And all I feel in my stomach is butterflies. The beautiful kind, making up for lost time, taking flight, making me feel like I just want to know you better”

I think that this is one of the most accurate and universal descriptions of what it feels like when you have a crush, so I definitely think that both TJ and Cyrus would relate to it. It’s soft and innocent and it’s what a middle school crush feels like before there is any drama or angst involved, or before you’re even sure that it is a crush. You just know that this person makes you feel different, and that you want to explore it further. 

I also particularly like the part that says “making up for lost time” in regards to their relationship, as I think that’s a very common feeling for people in the LGBTQ+ community. A lot of gay people start dating later than their friends, or don’t recognize that their crushes are crushes until further down the road. With both TJ and Cyrus being so emotionally closed off in their own ways, I think they probably both feel like they’ve been missing out on some experiences.

“Come back and tell me why I’m feeling like I’ve missed you all this time. Meet me there tonight, and let me know that it’s not all in my mind.”

I think the bridge of the song has become even more accurate since the costume day fiasco. I can imagine both TJ and Cyrus relating to these lines. They still convey that feeling of a light middle school crush, but there is an undertone of angst to it now. Cyrus feels like TJ has abandoned him, so the idea of him saying “come back” feels natural at this point. The line “tell me why I’m feeling like I’ve missed you all this time” could be said from either of their perspectives. They are both missing each other and how things were, and the use of “all this time” really makes it feel like they could just now be recognizing how they’ve felt all along.

I love the fact that the song says “meet me there” because it sounds so personal, like the person who the song is for knows where they should meet without it having to be said - which in the case of Cyrus and TJ, would obviously mean the swings. And I can easily imagine both Cyrus and TJ questioning what everything means, questioning if what they were feeling and experiencing was real or if they were imagining it. 

“All I know is we said hello, so dust off your highest hopes. All I know is pouring rain, and everything has changed. All I know is a new found grace. All my days, I’ll know your face. All I know since yesterday is everything has changed.”

“All I know is pouring rain, and everything has changed” is such a beautiful way to describe how Cyrus and TJ have changed each other’s lives since they started talking. Think back to Cyrus saying “He wants to be friends with me - who knows why”, or TJ saying “Anything good, I gotta ruin it”. They are so used to feeling unloved, to things going wrong for them, to the “pouring rain”, that they had no reason to hope or expect things to go right. But things have changed. 

“All my days, I’ll know your face” reminds me of Cyrus telling Jonah “that’s just his face” about TJ appearing to be mean. I always liked that line, because when Cyrus says it - you can almost see him picturing TJ’s face as he says it. Between that, and how many times we’ve watched them make eye contact - it feels like they really pay attention to small details about each other. That they know each other, down to their facial expressions.

And of course - the idea of “everything has changed” is the perfect way to describe TJ and Cyrus’ relationship thus far. In a literal sense, everything changed for the better once they became friends, and now everything has changed for the worst following costume day. In a more metaphorical sense-  Cyrus has changed things for TJ by helping him be more vulnerable, by inspiring him to better himself, and by encouraging to accept himself as he is. TJ has changed things for Cyrus by pushing him out of his comfort zone and inspiring him to stand up for himself and recognize his own worth. They have made things change for each other by simply caring about each other.

I love the fact that the song says “meet me there” because it sounds so personal, like the person who the song is for knows where they should meet without it having to be said - which in the case of Cyrus and TJ, would obviously mean the swings. And I can easily imagine both Cyrus and TJ questioning what everything means, questioning if what they were feeling and experiencing was real or if they were imagining it. 

“All I know is we said hello, so dust off your highest hopes. All I know is pouring rain, and everything has changed. All I know is a new found grace. All my days, I’ll know your face. All I know since yesterday is everything has changed.”

“All I know is pouring rain, and everything has changed” is such a beautiful way to describe how Cyrus and TJ have changed each other’s lives since they started talking. Think back to Cyrus saying “He wants to be friends with me - who knows why”, or TJ saying “Anything good, I gotta ruin it”. They are so used to feeling unloved, to things going wrong for them, to the “pouring rain”, that they had no reason to hope or expect things to go right. But things have changed. 

“All my days, I’ll know your face” reminds me of Cyrus telling Jonah “that’s just his face” about TJ appearing to be mean. I always liked that line, because when Cyrus says it - you can almost see him picturing TJ’s face as he says it. Between that, and how many times we’ve watched them make eye contact - it feels like they really pay attention to small details about each other. That they know each other, down to their facial expressions.

And of course - the idea of “everything has changed” is the perfect way to describe TJ and Cyrus’ relationship thus far. In a literal sense, everything changed for the better once they became friends, and now everything has changed for the worst following costume day. In a more metaphorical sense-  Cyrus has changed things for TJ by helping him be more vulnerable, by inspiring him to better himself, and by encouraging to accept himself as he is. TJ has changed things for Cyrus by pushing him out of his comfort zone and inspiring him to stand up for himself and recognize his own worth. They have made things change for each other by simply caring about each other.

icon by @spidaerman

summary: from a to z, you and me
title: from a to z, you and me
body:
apologies in advance for this filler chapter that took forever to write.  i promise something will actually happen soon, but hey, better some fluff than nothing, right?


Now

TJ’s pulling out his History textbook from his locker when Marty slapped his shoulder and made him swear at the top of his lungs.

“Dude, dude, stop screaming.  Party this weekend?” TJ adjusts his shirt with a light scowl.

“Who’s hosting?” The two boys start to walk down the hallway towards History, they’ll meet Jonah there.

“Me!  Buffy’s driving up Andi and Cyrus and Amber even said she’d drop by for a second.” TJ raises an eyebrow.

“You asked my sister before me, dude?  That’s cold,” Marty laughed and slung an arm over TJ’s shoulders.

“She’s the cooler one, what can I say?” TJ laughs and flicks Marty on the head.  He loves Marty with all his heart.  He was the first boy he’d ever liked, the soft fluffy haired boy from the basketball court years ago, but ever since he learned that he was the same Marty that Cyrus’ friend Buffy wrote to, he’d known they were meant to be best friends.  Between the two of them and Jonah, they’d been best friends since TJ had dumped Reed and Lester.  Their group was even better with the inclusion of Cyrus, Buffy, and Andi.  They’d been hanging out together since TJ was 14 years old and allowed to drive the crew to meet up (with his mom in the car of course).  Nothing could wreck their group.

Except for his big ass crush on the one and only Cyrus Goodman.  The crush that had been budding since they started talking in elementary school.  The crush that would absolutely implode the whole friend group.  Marty knew about this crush well enough, and so did Jonah, but the trio of dumbasses hadn’t figured out a way for TJ to tell Cyrus without wrecking the entire dynamic of the group.

As they walked into History, TJ let himself imagine for a solemn minute walking into Marty’s party and kissing Cyrus casually.  Like boyfriends did.  The thought was quickly shaken from his mind as Jonah flew into the seat next to him with a frantic look on his face.

“I think I forgot a four-month anniversary with Walker.”  Marty and TJ busted into laughter and TJ let himself forget for a minute the debilitating crush he had on Cyrus.

~

broccoli boi: so ur coming to marty’s party this weekend right?

cy: of course!  marty’s parties are legen

cy: wait for it

cy: DARY

broccoli boi: you need to stop rewatching how i met your mother

~

It was Thursday night and TJ was on his weekly phone call with Cyrus.  They didn’t always call on Thursdays, but Cyrus had taken it upon him to freak out about his outfit and TJ was always on call to calm him down.

“Cy, Cy, calm down.”

“TJ this is my first party as a junior!  I need to look perfect.”

“You always look perfect,” TJ winces as he hears himself compliment Cyrus but the boy on the other end was too hyped up to realize his faux pas.

“But TJ, would I look better in the blue sweater or the red one?”

“Blue.  You look best in blue.”

“Thanks,” TJ’s heart warmed at Cyrus’ tone and he yawned.  It was almost 1:30.

“Hey Cy, I’ll see you tomorrow, huh?”

“Of course!  I’ll see you tomorrow Teej.  Love you!”

“Love you,” TJ’s heart raced as he hung up.  They’d been saying “love you” for years but he would never get used to it.  

He never thought he could.

~

Teej,

Why don’t we say I love you?

Cyrus

~

Cy,

I dunno.

TJ

~

Teej,

We should.

Cyrus

~

Cy,

Okay.  I love you.

TJ

~

Teej,

I LOVE YOU TOO!

Cyrus


taglist <3

@illbeyourreasonwhy @tyrusflavoredtea @homosexualearthworm @proshipperandfangirl @bambikippen @unsteady-but-trying @sweet-cyrus @zooperx @ibroughtachallah @rellahad @cool-anonymous-tyrus-shipper

@leoinhistory @tj-looked-back-kippen @heart-eyes-kippen @cuddlytyrus

im sorry this is so bad
summary: HandShake (A Tumblr HeadCannon Butchred by yours truly)
body:
HandShake (A Tumblr HeadCannon Butchred by yours truly)

Handshake:

The GHC+Jonah and Marty had a problem well it was more like two problems TJ and Cyrus handshake they had made it up during lunch time or otherwise known as TJ stares at Cyrus for 45 minutes and constantly brings him muffins and they were so excited when they had come up with it that they showed everyone who was in a 3 mile radius the handshake It was cool at first but they never stopped doing it and Everyone else agreed they were sick of the Tyrus Plague. The GHC had ran to the spoon to look for an escape unfortunately Cyrus and TJ were human bloodhounds with pretty good fashion sense except for TJ hoodies Andi sighed and Buffy groaned at the spectple in front of her.

Cyrus hand crossed TJ,wrapped their arm around each other they did a little fist bump, a little underdog with their hands and jazz hands before spinning around, “So what do you guys think” Cyrus smiled enthusiastically

“It as great as the first 500 times” Andi mumbled

“Oh Cyrus let show it to them again” TJ suggested pls no everyone thought as they glanced at each other

“No” Everyone shouted loudly

“But-t-t You guys said you love our handshake” Cyrus said confused

“What We mean is that you should rest your hands” Buffy faked a smile at Cyrus before glaring at the others to play along

“Yeah” came unconvincing mumbles from the crowd “Aww okay” Cyrus sighed and sadly munched on a tater tot TJ glared at them while consoling Cyrus “Now who do we show this too TJ”

“Let’s go show Andi Parents” TJ suggested. Cyrus mood brightened, TJ held his hand and they ran to Andi house

“Maybe we should have our own handshake?” Marty suggested

“Marty I won’t hesitate to break up with you a second time” Buffy rolled her eyes and put her finger to Marty mouth

“So thats a No” Buffy glared at him she turned away towards the window to see TJ and Cyrus trapping a poor elderly couple on the way to Andi’s.

AN: I admit I dont know how to write a handshake but This turned out pretty good regardless But either way you get some Tyrus You get a Tyrus we all get a Tyrus did u catch my attempt at sneaking in The iconic nickname in the handshake

“No” Everyone shouted loudly

“But-t-t You guys said you love our handshake” Cyrus said confused

“What We mean is that you should rest your hands” Buffy faked a smile at Cyrus before glaring at the others to play along

“Yeah” came unconvincing mumbles from the crowd “Aww okay” Cyrus sighed and sadly munched on a tater tot TJ glared at them while consoling Cyrus “Now who do we show this too TJ”

“Let’s go show Andi Parents” TJ suggested. Cyrus mood brightened, TJ held his hand and they ran to Andi house

“Maybe we should have our own handshake?” Marty suggested

“Marty I won’t hesitate to break up with you a second time” Buffy rolled her eyes and put her finger to Marty mouth

“So thats a No” Buffy glared at him she turned away towards the window to see TJ and Cyrus trapping a poor elderly couple on the way to Andi’s.

AN: I admit I dont know how to write a handshake but This turned out pretty good regardless But either way you get some Tyrus You get a Tyrus we all get a Tyrus did u catch my attempt at sneaking in The iconic nickname in the handshake

summary: About that bi tj post:  Thank you  It annoys me when ppl act like he is confirmed gay like "he has a crush on Cyrus, so he must...
question: About that bi tj post:  Thank you  It annoys me when ppl act like he is confirmed gay like "he has a crush on Cyrus, so he must only be into guys?"  Like with that logic TJ is Cyrusromantic only romanticly attracted to Cyrus and no other people  It's like imagine a kids first solid meal they like is mac and cheese so the parents assume he only likes mac and cheese And they only feed him mac and cheese
answer: yeah! it bugs me when people get like offended at the fact that he could be bi? the possibility of him being bi does not mean that he can’t like cyrus? like i personally hc him as gay, but there’s absolutely no confirmation on his sexuality besides pretty much the fact that he likes cyrus. he could identify as anything, so idk why people get so butthurt when people hc him as bi.

reblog.comment: yeah! it bugs me when people get like offended at the fact that he could be bi? the possibility of him being bi does not mean that he can’t like cyrus? like i personally hc him as gay, but there’s absolutely no confirmation on his sexuality besides pretty much the fact that he likes cyrus. he could identify as anything, so idk why people get so butthurt when people hc him as bi.
